```{r message = F, warning = F}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(
  {
    require('dplyr')
    require('plotly')
    require('readr')
  }
)
Ranking_Data <- update_datasets(F)
recent_grads <- as.tbl(Ranking_Data[['recent-grads.csv']])

recent_grads_stats <- list("MEANS" = sapply(recent_grads[,], FUN = function(x){ifelse(is.numeric(x), mean(x), 0)}), 
                           "STDEVS" = sapply(recent_grads, FUN = function(x){ifelse(is.numeric(x), sd(x), 0)}))

recent_grads %>% arrange(desc(Rank)) %>% vars(Rank, Major, Major_category, Men, Women, )


```
